availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Scott (Kenton County resident (composite bio))

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Signed a petition on behalf of Frederick Ampher in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 206A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 361.
Find A Grave, "James Scott (Unknown-Unknown)," Memorial #153232365, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/153232365 (accessed January 7, 2020).
